name: Lago Lizard 2
description:
Hidden in the Kingdom of Lagolot, is Merlin's Enchanted Forest.
Lagolot's kingdom is divided into four independent kingdoms. The kingdom of the North region, the East region, the South region and the West region.

Each kingdom is divided into six zones.
To end a kingdom, you must go through all its zones, kill the scorpion, guardian of the last area, and unearth the sword Excalibur. If you succeed, you will be crowned King of that region of the forest.

When completing the four kingdoms in campaign mode, you will have to face the dragon, that keeps the lady of the lake kidnapped, to free her and expel it from the kingdom of Lagolot. As a consecrated knight, you will be crowned king of the kingdom of Lagolot.

Harness the power of magic provided by your host, the magician Merlin. And may its magic be with you.

Campaign game mode:
Get the crowns of the four kingdoms, and sit on the throne of the king of Lagolot.

Survival game mode:
Survive successive waves, with increasing challenges.

Install instructions:
Requires Java.
If you can't run the application by double clicking, try running "java -jar LagoMEF.jar".
